div.bibl: Svornost, Chicago, September 6th, 1878. [SOKOL SOCIETY ELECTS OFFICERS]

body.p: "Telocvicna Jednota Sokol" (Gymnastic Society Sokol) at its semi-annual meeting last night elected the following as officers for the next six months: V. Nemecek, President; Jos. Vondrejka, Vice President; Gust. B. Reisl, Secretary; M. Svojse, Treasurer. Managing Committee for one year V. Stejskal and M. Traznik, and for six months Fr. Cilik and J. Svojse.
